statusTrace:
self = <test_system.test_planUnit.TestPlanUnitPage object at 0x0000024AB5770070>, login_to_planUnit = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="e0b04492b5f524f7cad938b2c9468a82")>

    @allure.story("没有数据时显示正常")
    # @pytest.mark.run(order=1)
    def test_unit_selectnodatasuccess(self, login_to_planUnit):
        driver = login_to_planUnit  # WebDriver 实例
        unit = PlanUnitPage(driver)  # 用 driver 初始化 PlanUnitPage
    
        # 点击查询
        unit.click_sel_button()
        sleep(1)
        # 定位名称输入框
        element_to_double_click = driver.find_element(
            By.XPATH,
            '(//div[@class="vxe-table--render-wrapper"])[3]/div[1]/div[2]//tr[1]/td[4]',
        )
        # 创建一个 ActionChains 对象
        actions = ActionChains(driver)
        # 双击命令
        actions.double_click(element_to_double_click).perform()
        sleep(1)
        # 点击物料代码
        unit.click_button('//div[text()="计划单元" and contains(@optid,"opt_")]')
        sleep(1)
        # 点击比较关系框
        unit.click_button(
            '(//div[@class="vxe-table--render-wrapper"])[3]/div[1]/div[2]//tr[1]/td[5]//input'
        )
        sleep(1)
        # 点击=
        unit.click_button('//div[text()="=" and contains(@optid,"opt_")]')
        sleep(1)
        # 点击输入数值
        unit.enter_texts(
            '(//div[@class="vxe-table--render-wrapper"])[3]/div[1]/div[2]//tr[1]/td[6]//input',
            "没有数据",
        )
        sleep(1)
    
        # 点击确认
        unit.click_button(
            '(//div[@class="demo-drawer-footer"]//span[text()="确定"])[3]'
        )
        sleep(1)
        unitcode = driver.find_elements(
            By.XPATH,
            '(//table[contains(@class, "vxe-table--body")])[2]//tr[@class="vxe-body--row"][1]/td[2]',
        )
>       assert len(unitcode) == 0
